DOC.brief_title: Effects Osteopathic Treatment Vestibular Disturbed Active Post Concussed Individual
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study randomize clinical trial purpose determine efficacy osteopathic treatment vestibular symptom post concuss vestibular disturbed athlete determine Dizziness Handicap Inventory ( DHI ) Balance Error Scoring System ( BESS ) . Of secondary interest , study evaluate osteopathic assessment finding population side effect , positive negative , associated osteopathic treatment provide . The study focus Athletes age 18-40 received concussion continue suffer sequela symptom , include vestibular disturbance , minimum 1-month maximum 1-year post concussion . A sport medicine physician screen potential participant inclusion exclusion criterion refer project appropriate . All subject receive initial osteopathic evaluation baseline BESS DHI . There total 7 balance test perform week first 5 week final 8-week mark . Dizziness inventory complete daily duration 8-week project . The control group receive standard care , rest , whereas experimental group receive four osteopathic treatment addition rest . The experimental group , addition complete BESS test DHI form also account side effect associate osteopathic treatment daily follow treatment .
